attributes.action: Make the England Football teams manager a vote by the people of England
attributes.additional_details:
Massive failure in all tournaments barring 1996 since World Cup 66!

An abhorrent display of aptitude & attitude in all tournaments barring the above dates.
attributes.background: For over 50 years we have suffered as a footballing nation due to the poor decisions made by our football association. I believe the people of this great country, not an association should choose who leads our country into world wide tournaments & restores pride to our national game!
